dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HR 142 IH: To amend the Coast Guard Authorization Act of 1989 to expand the Coast Guard Junior Reserve Officers Training Program Pilot Program to include a Coast Guard unit at Pinellas Park High School in Pinellas Park, Florida, and for other purposes.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Jolly introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

form.official-title: To amend the Coast Guard Authorization Act of 1989 to expand the Coast Guard Junior Reserve Officers Training Program Pilot Program to include a Coast Guard unit at Pinellas Park High School in Pinellas Park, Florida, and for other purposes.

section.header: Expansion of Coast Guard Junior Reserve Officers Training Program Pilot Program

subsection.text: Subsection (a) of section 204 of the Coast Guard Authorization Act of 1989 (Public Law 101–225; 14 U.S.C. 92 note) is amended—

paragraph.text: by striking in cooperation and inserting the following:
by striking the period at the end and inserting ; and; and
by adding at the end the following new paragraph:
in cooperation with the Pinellas County School District of Pinellas County, Florida, as part of Pinellas Park High School (hereinafter in this section referred to as the High School).
by inserting and the High School after Academy in subsections (b)(2), (c), and (d) (the first and third places Academy appears); and
by inserting or the High School, as the case may be after Academy in subsection (d) (the second place Academy appears).
